Texts.Chs: 一个可以在北极生活的寒冷家园。如果你喜欢这类东西，那就太好了。
Texts.Eng: A chilly home for arctic livin'. It's nice, if you like that sorta thing.

Texts.Chs: 冰屋。天气比你想象的要暖和得多！
Texts.Eng: An igloo. It's much warmer than you'd expect!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人觉得这个小房子太冷了。
Texts.Eng: Floran thinks little housse is too chilly.

Texts.Chs: 虽然很好，但我不认为自己能住在这样的家里。
Texts.Eng: Nice as it is, I don't think I could see myself living in a home like this.

Texts.Chs: 哦，酷，冰屋！现在如果我有一些杂烩...
Texts.Eng: Oh cool, an igloo! Now if only I had some chowder...

Texts.Chs: 了不起。我从没想过雪会成为如此有效的绝缘体！
Texts.Eng: Remarkable. I never would've thought snow would make for such an effective insulator!

Texts.Chs: 雪和冰被压实成了一座惊人坚固的房子。
Texts.Eng: Snow and ice have been compacted to make a surprisingly sturdy house.

Texts.Chs: 谁把这间小屋组装起来，谁就相当聪明。这些冰块切割得很好！
Texts.Eng: Whoever put this little hut together is rather clever. These ice blocks are perfectly cut!
